column5: What are places people get those recommended sunglasses from?
I know a guy.....1 (416) 875-1759 Marc a Maui Jim Dealer among some other brands
Got mine online from Ed's Fly Shop.

I use flip-ups that I got from Bass Pro, about $30. Probably (Well, definitely) not as good as megabuck ultra-chic stylish prescription ones, but they serve me fine. They come in various shapes to match most lens styles.
i try them on at bass pro, i buy them from ebay.
Mountain Equipment Coop has a nice selection of glasses under $60.  I find the clarity and build quality very good for the price.
I have just always bought from the sunglasses hut!
